entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Area - Completion - Override Completion #75787
  • Area - Formatting - 2 #75786
  • Area - Formatting #75785
  • Area - Make Method Asynchronous #75781
  • Area - Use Pattern Matching #75780
  • Area - Convert to Conditional Expression #75778
  • Area - Use Expression Body #75777
  • Area - Make Field Readonly #75776
  • Area - Pull Members Up #75775
  • Area - Inline Variable Declaration #75774
  • Area - Wrapping #75772
  • Area - Use Auto Property #75771
  • Area - Organize Imports #75770
  • Area - Extract Interface #75769
  • Area - Go to Metadata #75768
  • Area - Reference Highlighting #75767
  • Area - Snippets #75766
  • Area - Event Hookup #75765

Closed

  • Convert to conditional expression refactoring disgards null-forgiving operator #38879
    Backlog
  • Primary Constructor with Self-Type Parameter Creates Uninstantiable Class Without Compiler Error #75742
  • The download URL for perfview is an old link #29389
    18.0
  • Area: MSBuildWorkspace #75580
  • VS2019 - Expression Trees: Rosyln Analyzer incorrectly suggests converting an anonymous type with property assignment to a tuple #34749
    Backlog
  • Building Roslyn.sln does not deploy servicehub binaries properly., #74155
  • Incremental builds are broken in Roslyn.sln. #74154
  • Can only build Roslyn.sln a single time before building breaks. #74153
  • Fix CA1827 (DoNotUseCountWhenAnyCanBeUsed) violations in Roslyn.sln #37959
  • Roslyn 4.10.0 does not compile for .NET 6 #74016
  • Add RPS typing test for repo with editorconfig at repo root #46721
  • Use Central Package Management #47664
  • Tracking issue on license/cla failures #67965
  • Another Round of Milestone Cleanup #65389
  • Style await with Keyword - Control Category #40741
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35506.11 #75784
  • Suggest exceptions to catch with try-catch block #41015
    Backlog
  • Disable code analysis scrollbar annotations #40742
    Backlog
  • VB.Net "Hide Advanced Members" is always on #40497
    Backlog
  • `Else` not offered in VB Completion after `Exit For` #40449
    Backlog
  • IntelliSense in multi-targeted projects shouldn't show warnings when APIs are merely hidden #40370
    Backlog
  • Violation of rule IDE0032 is not shown if property is declared virtual #40123
    Backlog
  • Consider folding '#region' on 'Collapse to Definitions' #40122
    Backlog
  • Remove Workspace.OnWorkspaceFailed (breaking change) #40085
    Backlog
  • Move introduce local to the top of the list #39977
    Backlog
  • local introduce variable is very inconsistent #39806
    Backlog
  • DeclarationNameCompletionProvider should suggest out parameter name #39538
    Backlog
  • CompletionLists don't help make clear which object properties are nullable and which aren't. #39516
    Backlog
  • Add an analyzer, codefix for organize imports #38716
    Backlog
  • AD0001 (KeyNotFoundException) from AbstractRemoveUnusedParametersAndValuesDiagnosticAnalyzer #38668
    Backlog
  • Extract internal class to an internal interface #38637
    Backlog
  • IDE0018 preview presents incorrect option if blank line present #38558
    Backlog
  • Inline rename throws InvalidOperationException in ASP.NET Core page #38557
    Backlog
  • Why you can not wrap a select case? #38530
    Backlog
  • Duplicate PeekDefinition results for TS IGoToDefinitionService implementation #38483
    Backlog
  • VS2017 Debugging - Use the legacy C# and VB Expression Evaluators - Deprecated #37759
    Backlog
  • Move Code Experience #37243
    Backlog
  • C#: Error check/scan/rename inactive #if blocks #37171
    Backlog
  • Extract Interface ... creates file with interface but does not navigate to it. #35531
    Backlog
  • Internal Error in the expression evaluator #35025
    Backlog
  • [Regression] Usages are not highlighted is next character is an operator #34108
    Backlog
  • [Feature] Distribute code snippets with nuget package #33146
    Backlog
  • Source control switching with large files results in lots of file change events which results in lots of file re-reading #33141
    Backlog
  • Continuing typing too fast after running "Add using" doesn't add the code fix #33140
    Backlog
  • make sure workspace related events are serialized #32551
    Backlog
  • Warning/errors/messages are not correctly grouped for multi-targeting projects #32055
    Backlog
  • Fix when a interface starting with 'I' isn't prefixed with an 'I' is a bit silly #17656
    Backlog
  • ProjectChanges.GetChangedDocuments(true) returns unchanged document #30674
    Backlog
  • Misplaced indent guides #30300
    Backlog
  • Developer mode design document #29123
    Backlog
  • SyntaxEditor could be more efficient when just operating on changes that do not involve lambda callbacks #28378
    Backlog
  • ChangeSignature: Error encountered while changing delegate signature <ChangeSignnatureCodeRefactoringProvider> #28292
    Backlog
  • Toggling Show advanced build configurations should update project's configuration #28267
    Backlog
  • In FolderView : Comment Out Selected Lines Does Not Work #27965
    Backlog
  • With a large number of files open, it takes 6 - 10 seconds bring up Rename prompt #26580
    Backlog
  • After options changed, analyzer messages are not reevaluated until you modify source code #26530
    Backlog
  • Show return types in completion #26489
    Backlog
  • global namespace imports with alias in VB #25977
    Backlog
  • Add member classification for captured locals #25924
    Backlog
  • Intellisense + Capital Letters #17275
    Backlog
  • Wiki Samples-and-Walkthroughs page has broken samples links #24545
    Backlog
  • Refactor Inline Rename command handler to not use chaining #24430
    Backlog
  • Auto completing quotation mark is not working when using CW code snippet #24376
    Backlog
  • Assertion failed: in CodeModel.CSharpCodeModelService.CodeModelEventCollector #24357
    Backlog
  • Expected behavior for Go To Definition for metadata references #24349
    Backlog
  • editorconfig not working for VB.NET in 15.5.2 #24232
    Backlog
  • Event handler references should be counted correctly for derived WPF controls #24146
    Backlog
  • Line break options ignored in C# editor #24029
    Backlog
  • Crash on applying an analyzer fixer across a large solution #23973
    Backlog
  • Refactoring icon should be applied per-diagnostic #23005
    Backlog
  • Rename Tracking appears in the lightbulb even when the new name binds (and the dotted border goes away) #22749
    Backlog
  • Potential data race in the file GCManager.cs #22425
    Backlog
  • Provide option to disable declaration completion name suggestions #22294
    Backlog
  • VS should offer to replace uninitialized `var` with inferred type if that type is initialized a few lines later #21548
    Backlog
  • Have a refactoring to add clarifying parentheses #21505
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Razor to 9.0.0-preview.24555.12 #75794
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Test OverloadResolution.vb #75793
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Test some assumptions (2) in OverloadResolution.vb #75792
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix issue classifying while performing a layout #75791
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Test some assumptions in OverloadResolution.vb #75790
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix: fix all for Use Auto Property #75788
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • EE: Support compact name in `IDkmLanguageInstructionDecoder.GetMethodName()` implementation #75764
    Area-Interactive, untriaged

Merged

  • Update breaking change docs #75789
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Fix issue with 'convert to conditional expression' and the suppression operator #75779
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Don't offer 'convert anon type to tuple' when in an expression tree #75773
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Update Language Feature Status.md with VB information #75763
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Classify 'await' as a control keyword #75782
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.13 to main #75783
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.13 to main #75672
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, VSCode, Next
  • Improve pattern matching when user is likely providing camel humps #75757
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Have the naming style fixer understand the 'I' pattern for interfaces better #75758
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Adjust `ContainingSymbol` for substituted local function #75636
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.13
  • Bind lambda in object initializer despite errors #75695
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Clear current value when awaiting in async-iterator #75426
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Adjust semantic model for method group conversion #75719
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Revert "Reduce File I/O under the AnalyzerAssemblyLoader folder (#724… #75761
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Pass `runningProject` to `GetUpdateAsync` and get projectToRebuild and projectToRestart back #75503
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Parse directives in trailing trivia as skipped tokens trivia #75724
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Warn for redundant pattern in `not ... or <redundant>` pattern #75581
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update VSSDK and Gladstone versions #75594
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Struct layout check – break an infinite generic expansion cycle that doesn’t include the target struct (a cycle at the end of the path) #75702
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Modify segmented list to grow by growth rate. #75756
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle directives in trailing trivia #75595
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
